data: The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" addresses the project kickoff and the review of a requirements document.
The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" contains a request for feedback on the attached requirements document.
The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" documents the client's feedback to clarify section 3 of the requirements document.
The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" records the client's request to extend the project timeline by two weeks.
The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" confirms the agency's agreement to update section 3 and adjust the project schedule.
The thread "Project Kickoff and Requirements" specifies that the updated requirements will be delivered on May 20th.
